metadata.synopsis: PAD onliner that triggers when players destroy a canopic jar for the first time.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Debugbook -> quest flags -> act 3 -> Philgrave's Mansion -> get objects -> get jars2) Drop and ctrl+k one of the jars

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That did the trick. Nothing but ashes left of that jar now.
